channel.title: Boston Celtics
channel.description: An unofficial site of the Boston Celtics. The site consists of news, lists of current and former players as well as various photos and videos.

item.title: Roster
item.description: This page contains the official roster of the 2019-2020 season.

item.title: History
item.description: This page contains a fan made hall of fame including a list of all 35 players inducted.

item.title: Hall Of Fame
item.description: This page contains highlights of the greatest players of the celtics franchise.

item.title: Highlights
item.description: This page contains highlights of the greatest players of the celtics franchise.

item.title: Artwork
item.description: This page consists of several fan made wallpapers created to honor players artistically.

item.title: About Us
item.description: This page contains a brief biography of the author of the site - Nikola Malic
